title: The minimum segregating distance between different zones shall be the distance as measured from the opposite edge of the road/Nalla/Watercourse (existing or proposed) in which the zone happens to abut
clause_text: The minimum segregating distance between different zones shall be the distance as measured from the opposite edge of the road/Nalla/Watercourse (existing or proposed) in which the zone happens to abut.
